alert.note: Alert for Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:17PM EDT until July 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WINDHAM...NORTHWESTERN BRISTOL...NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHEASTERN NEWPORT...KENT...PROVIDENCE AND BRISTOL COUNTIES... At 617 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smithfield, or near North Providence, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, North Kingstown, Windham, Bristol, Plainfield, Attleboro and Mansfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
